messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Our first nasty spam
messages.msgSnippet: Same thi happened on SHQ today but it was caught. yes you can ban them. I set the controls to moderate all new members that way if this happens it doesn t
messages.messageBody:
Same thi happened on SHQ today but it was caught. yes you can ban them.
I set the controls to moderate all new members that way if this happens
it doesn't reach the list and when a real member's first post reaches
you you can simply set them to non moderated.

spiritus_saitou wrote:

>At least I don't remember any others...
>
>Anyway, I removed the offender from the membership and deleted the
>post. Sorry I don't know of any way of retrieving such messages from
>inboxes. In future, I'll simply remove and delete without
>notification. (Is there indeed a way of "banning" someone... anyone
>here with any moderator/owner experience with yahoogroups that knows
>or has done this?)
>
>Sorry for the inconvenience...
>phil

messages.subject: Our first nasty spam
messages.msgSnippet: At least I don t remember any others... Anyway, I removed the offender from the membership and deleted the post.  Sorry I don t know of any way of retrieving
messages.messageBody:
At least I don't remember any others...

Anyway, I removed the offender from the membership and deleted the
post. Sorry I don't know of any way of retrieving such messages from
inboxes. In future, I'll simply remove and delete without
notification. (Is there indeed a way of "banning" someone... anyone
here with any moderator/owner experience with yahoogroups that knows
or has done this?)

Sorry for the inconvenience...
phil
